document.title: Clear Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: Based on your assessment, this is a straightforward alignment case focusing on your upper teeth using clear aligners. The treatment is expected to take approximately 4–6 months, with progress primarily monitored remotely, minimizing the need for frequent in-office visits. This approach is generally smooth and predictable, and we'll support you through each step to keep things on track. Whitening is included as part of your overall smile plan, enhancing your results.
key_points: Simple alignment case for upper teeth
next_steps: Begin treatment with initial aligner fitting
